value:
I can move rather easily in this outfit.
Its versatility is convenient.

No matter the part I play, my vows
still hold true: I shall never wield
a blade against a woman.

...If we have no business to
discuss, then leave me alone.

A ninja must serve a master... So
that means I'm now beholden
to $Nu?

So, a ninja must work exclusively in
the shadows to complete missions...

My business will be short. I'm only
here to deliver a personal message
from $Nf.
Moving on to the next mission.
It's settled.
Was my presence detected?

So this is what a ninja's power
looks like... Not bad.

I'm Navarre. Apparently ninja can be
ordered to fight anyone, but I'm not
so blindly loyal as to attack women.

Throughout my life, I've worked as
a mercenary, a swordsman, and
taken on various other jobs.$k$pWere the employers immoral? Was
the work dirty? Those details never
affected me.$k$pI thought working as a ninja would be
no different. A job is a job. However,
something preoccupied my interest...$k$pThe similarities between the path of
the sword and the way of the ninja
are apparent once you study both.$k$pAlthough this is just a festival, I'm
fortunate to have discovered this
connection. I thank you...
たあっ
立ち去れ
ぐっ…
小癪な…
No business with you.
Not your lucky day.
Submit to fate.
As I am ordered.
Not here...
ふう
I am Navarre. These clothes are for the festival.
Back off unless you have a death wish.
Ninja excel at assassination and intelligence gathering. I wouldn't want to make enemies of them.
There are female ninja, yes. But I shall not raise my blade against them.
Sword or not, if it has a blade, I will master it.
Perhaps someday I'll be able to let my guard down and enjoy a festival like this...
If you require my aid, then I will fight for you.
Just say the word.
Do you have a plan?
Let's settle this.
